GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v4.14.306
GSD.description:
net/usb: kalmia: Don't pass act_len in usb_bulk_msg error path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.306 by commit 1b5de7d44890b78519acbcc80d8d1f23ff2872e5, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit d40261236e8e278cb1936cb5e934262971692b10. For more details please see the references link.
